sourcesContent:
<template>
  <component :is="layout">
    <router-view />
  </component>

</template>
<script>
import { computed } from 'vue'
import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'

import { PUBLIC_LAYOUT } from '@/constants'

export default {
  setup() {
    const route = useRoute()
    return {
      layout: computed(() => (route.meta.layout || PUBLIC_LAYOUT) + "-layout"),
    }
  }
}

</script>
